description: Seriously versatile, the Kyanite is the fleece you grab for quick climbs, ski days, cold hikes, and to cut the chill when you roll out of bed. Worn as a midlayer or standalone, it delivers warmth with freedom of movement and soft comfort. The Polartec® Power Stretch® Pro has a nylon face for abrasion resistance, a lofty brushed interior, and four-way stretch. The clean fit delivers unrestricted comfort and layers easily under a shell, and a low-profile hood adds warmth.
name: Arcteryx Kyanite Hoody - Mens

specs.value: Polartec® Power Stretch® Pro - 53% polyester, 38% nylon, 9% elastane
